responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "0828CF874AFA6038F88E8F8E040E51A8", "Me? I am Scribe Ibram, an ardent scholar from the Scholars Academy, where I study all things magic. Farzaan mentioned you might need assistance. If you seek to unlock the mysteries of ancient spells or delve into forgotten magical lore, I am here to aid you. My knowledge and expertise are at your service, so feel free to ask about Verra\'s magical history or any arcane subject that piques your interest.")
name: DD_CSQ_0074_Ibram_27
